# Arch dotfiles

## Dependencies:
- Qtile (obviously)
  - Qtile layout icons extra (already included in this repo)
- Qtile-extras
  
- Nitrogen
  - Archlinux-wallpaper
    
- Zsh
  - Oh my Zsh

- NeoVim
  - NeoVim Pluggins

- Alacritty
  
- Rofi ["App launcher/menu" could be replaced with dmenu (which is faster btw)]
  
- Scrot

- Alsa
  - Pamixer (pulse audio mixer)
  - Amixer

- Volumeicon

- Xbindkeys (for spotify play/pause/skip)

- Dunst (notifications)

- Unclutter
